title: Dr. Joe Rocks Fund in Aortic Research
description: To provide research and faculty support at the discretion of Joseph C. Cleveland, Jr., MD, in the areas of aortic dissection and related aortic research/cardiothoracic surgery at the University of Colorado  Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide research and faculty support at the discretion of Joseph C. Cleveland, Jr., MD, in the areas of aortic dissection and related aortic research/cardiothoracic surgery at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
